amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to allow local government units to review housing unit counts, jurisdictional boundaries, and other data for the purpose of identifying discrepancies or other potential problems before the 2000 decennial census is completed.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to allow local government units to review housing unit counts, jurisdictional boundaries, and other data for the purpose of identifying discrepancies or other potential problems before the 2000 decennial census tabulation of total population by States.

action.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mrs. Maloney (NY).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney (NY) amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 202 - 226 (Roll no. 88).
